endpoints.description: Retrieve aggregated trends of vehicle sales categorized by region, model, and timeframe.
Submit data to analyze customer preferences based on recent survey inputs.
Access predictive analytics reports on market demands for upcoming periods.
Obtain a detailed report on sales performance for a specific dealership.
Set desired sales goals and receive insights to achieve them effectively.
Retrieve detailed data on customer segmentation for better targeted marketing.
Analyze historical and current pricing trends for various vehicle categories.
Upload current inventory data to receive optimization recommendations.
Compare vehicle sales performance across different geographical regions.
Submit marketing campaign data to evaluate its effectiveness and ROI.
